verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Lift up your heads (echo)
To the coming King (echo)
Bow before Him
And adore Him, sing (echo)
To His majesty (echo)
Let your praises be (echo)
Pure and holy, giving glory
To the King of kings

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Let there be glory and honor and praises
Glory and honor to Jesus
Glory, honor
Glory and honor to Him
